context: Snap Inc. is a camera and social media company focused on Snapchat app, AR lenses, and Spectacles. Spotlight short videos. AR advertising growth.

competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Explosive growth in short-form video threatening Snap's youth audience

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Stories and Reels competing directly with Snapchat features

competitors.name: Facebook
competitors.notes: Parent Meta competing across social and AR

competitors.name: YouTube
competitors.notes: Video platform launching Shorts for short-form content
